name: Arson Axolotls
description:
Welcome to Axe-olotl's! There's cake, parties, and entities out to kill you! Wait, what?

Arson Axolotls is a horror game that has taken four months to reach its final fully-fledged version. There are six characters: Ace the Bat, Delta the Snake, Sonar the Music Note, Melody the Butterfly, Splash the Axolotl, and the star, Axe-olotl! There is roughly an hour of gameplay that will surprise you at every corner, and the extra Altered Mode that you can customize any way you like! On top of all that, this place has a deep secret they don't want you to find out...

Get ready for arson ᓬ(•̀ᴗ•́)ᕒ

The following consists of a better described version of the in-game credits, an update log, and a quick fun fact section!

------------------------------ Update Log -------------------

Nothing yet :(

------------------------ Cool Stuff & Facts ----------------

1. Arson Axolotls was based on old drawings of characters I made.

2. Arson is the act of purposefully setting fire to property, or the act of killing using fire.

3. Press letter keys in the lobby and some cool stuff might happen :)

4. There are currently 82 sprites and about 6400 blocks.

5. Splash, the newest character, was made within 3 days. He isn't Blue. He's more of a mix of Cobalt and Lapis.

6. I have a YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@lagmaster_gaming

7. This game was made on Scratch.
